Name: Last Straw
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Garnish with apple wedge on rim.
Review: Three stages of the apple's alcoholic journey, juice, cider and brandy, are sweetened and aromatised by elderflower liqueur.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly. We used the last straw we had left to sample the first one. Fortunately, there are alternatives to plastic straws .
Nutrition: One serving of Last Straw contains 268 calories
